      • Publisher

        public Publisher(EventUpdater eventUpdater,
                 EventChannel eventChannel)
        Constructor of Publisher, so Publisher can be initialize with Player and communication binding
        Parameters:
        eventUpdater - EventUpdater - Binding with relation with Player, so Player can be added as Publisher
        eventChannel - EventChannel - Channel to make communication between Subscribers via Dispatcher
